meanings.definition: An event or gathering that occurs before a main meeting or event.
meanings.sent1: The premeet was a chance for everyone to get to know each other before the big meeting.
meanings.sent2: Let's make sure to attend the premeet so we can plan everything properly.
meanings.sent3: The premeet turned into a mini party with snacks and music.
meanings.sent4: The premeet was like a warm-up before the main event, getting everyone ready.
meanings.sent5: Attending the premeet helped me feel more comfortable and prepared for the meeting.

meanings.definition: To meet or gather before a main meeting or event.
meanings.sent1: We decided to premeet at the coffee shop to discuss our strategy.
meanings.sent2: Let's premeet before the big presentation to go over our slides.
meanings.sent3: They premeet every Friday to catch up and plan for the week ahead.
meanings.sent4: I like to premeet with my team to ensure we are all on the same page.
meanings.sent5: Premeeting allows us to iron out any issues before the main meeting.
